value.title: StarCraft 2: Zerglings COUNTERING Void Rays? (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Two games of StarCraft 2 submitted by viewers. Some of the absolute worst StarCraft I've seen in a while... But a lot of fun! value.title: We paid a Pro to do Troll Builds: Dance a Colosuss in their Base! | Twitch Plays Gabe  - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: We paid Heromarine (Big Gabe) to participate in a Twitch Plays Gabe segment for PiGFest - and he delivered by dropping a Colossus into the opponent's base and DANCING THEM! Has anyone ever realised how cool it looks when collossi dance? Also they can still attack while doing so  Heromarine's stream:

value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)
value.excerpt: The standard competitive mode in StarCraft 2 is 1v1. However the OlimoLeague recently put on an event where they invited three teams of progamers to face off in a 2v2 (2 vs 2) event. In this video I cast a best-of-5 between Maru and sOs on one team, and MaxPax and souL on the other.  OlimoLeague on Patreon:
